intent: To develop a custom, web-based, mobile-responsive CRM system for a real estate business that manages client contacts, tracks property listings, and schedules viewings.
functional_requirements: Integrate with Gmail for email automation
Integrate with Google Calendar for appointment scheduling
technical_constraints: Support 5 sales agents with simultaneous access
ambiguities: Detailed feature set and workflows for client contact management (e.g., lead management, communication history, search/filter capabilities)
Detailed feature set and workflows for property listing tracking (e.g., photo management, detailed attributes, status workflows, search/filter capabilities)
Detailed feature set and workflows for property viewing scheduling (e.g., agent availability, client notifications, conflict resolution)
Data migration strategy from any existing systems
Specific security protocols and data privacy requirements
Non-functional requirements like performance and scalability beyond 5 users
User training and ongoing support expectations
